column5: Large 1 bed 1 bath Luxury apartment in Fairview (close to Allen, Plano, Mckinney, Lucas, Frisco). Entire private apartment - Large Bedroom with Queen Size Bed, walk in closet, hardwood floors, laundry room, fully furnished kitchen, TV, Netflix, Hulu, Wi-Fi large patio, first floor corner unit with lots of light. Walk 5 min to iPic, Macy's, Whole Foods. Walk to Village at Allen. Easy access to 75, plenty of free parking.
